author: Amarnath Tewary
text:
Lalu Prasad is set to be re-elected president of the Rashtriya Janata Dal for the ninth consecutive time, with no other leaders filing nominations for the post. On Friday, Mr. Prasad filed his papers. The election, if required, will be held on January 17.

Rabri Devi, wife of Mr. Prasad and former Bihar Chief Minister, proposed his name in the nomination submitted to the party’s national election officer, Jagdanand Singh. “Under his leadership, the party has reached great heights, and the workers have faith in Lalu ji so much that he will again be elected unopposed,” Ms. Rabri Devi told presspersons.
title: Lalu set to be re-elected RJD chief
